title: Find Your Lunch Table: Which Champs Are Friends?

replies.body: Where is the line connecting Taric and Ezreal ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Thats how important the connection is
Its invisible ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
naawwwww its true love
Nah, but it has connected Lux and Ezreal...
if riot acknowledges that ap ekko is hard to play, why do they keep nerfing himmmmm
check the nerfs. they're nerfing tank ekko not ap ekko. in fact, the "nerfs" lower base damage while boosting ap ratios making AP ekkos hurt even more post "nerf"
Yep Yep very true
lol i like how lee is eating carrots in the picture to improve his eye sight nice 1
Kennen is literally only connected to Gnar. As someone who loves Kennen but is terrible at Gnar, I don't know how to feel about this...
Kennen is missing some links. {{champion:150}}
IKR I clicked on Kennen because while I've never played him I like the idea of an AP stun bot for my next support, I was so sad to see that only Gnar appears to be connected (AP Gnar FTW though)
i play kennen and gnar
{{champion:103}} I Know who I want to be connected with

You missed 1 group:

The 'wannabe pro fanboy' group. 

its the clearest cluster on the whole board consisting of: Zed/Lee/Yasuo.
'tryhards' would also suit that group. Could add Vayne in there as well.
Pretty Much, oh, and don't forget Riven and Leblanc
And as you go away from that cluster you find less try-hard champions, see Yorick, Galio, Mordekaiser.

(Assassins and Mechanically Difficult Champs). This group spans multiple roles (mid, top, jungle) and consists of champs that are generally considered very difficult to master or have high skill ceilings. Riven, Fizz, Lee Sin, Ekko, Rengar, Yasuo, and Zed sit here. These highlight montages ain’t gonna record themselves.

**They said Fizz**

They said: Riven, Lee, Ekko, Rengar, Yasuo, and Zed too, and theres no way that can be right.

i think they just got the name of the group wrong, dw about it. They'll soon realise their mistake and change it to 'Bitch champions' you'll see.

Those champions actually take skill,

Please get a life.

"X champion totally takes skill you're just a bitch"
-X Champion main

"X champion is the newbiest champion ever"
-Y champion main who is heavily counted by X champion.
Im guessing you play one of them? lol
im guessing your an adc main? bwahaha
uh, fizz is one of them and he takes absolutely no skill what so ever. the rest, yes, but him, not even close.
;( I main Ekko (i play him ap)
LIES!!! Says Amumu has friends.....{{item:3070}}

Vel'koz my squiddy not getting any love at all... I almost never see him being played as a sup or a mid apart from me and he has the LEAST amount of connections that i have found :c {{item:3070}} Hell even bard, zyra, urgot and yorick have more connections than him...
Its ok, I'm your friend {{champion:90}}

Kennen has less connections.

P.S. He only has one connection, it's to Gnar.
I'm a braum/blitzcrank/Caitlyn/Lucian/morgana/annie player. So basically ADC and playmaking support.

Galio is heavy meta atm though, he wrecks any mage mid.

I'm sure I don't have to explain this to you but I'll explain it to everyone anyway;

It's because he builds magic resist and gets AP for it so he takes less damage and gets more damage from one stat, heh.
I really want to know the lore behind some of these friendships like how they hang out and stuff haha
Ah, it's a shame Taliyah cold be in here, since she's my favourite champ. Still though, I'm not entirely sure which champs I'd put her with, since my choice of champs is very eclectic. :L
zed connected to khazix lb rengar... all my mains :/ this is scary true
I checked my top 3 champs, {{champion:245}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:421}} and somehow they're all connected somehow! Who would've thought!

Im doing computer science at uni and am just reviewing graphs like this not even 5 minutes before i clicked on the link. It makes me happy how the stuff im learning right now can help find out stuff like this. Truly awesome article.
So this is what you have been doing instead of fixing Dyanamic Queue.
